Home / Temporary Power / Hybrid Battery Unit

Hybrid Battery Unit

At John F Hunt Power we are committed to offering our clients the most efficient solutions to hire for their temporary power requirements.  Our range of battery powered equipment not only offers the perfect solution for sites looking to reduce their carbon footprint, but it also provides the opportunity for periods of noise free power overnight for those projects with nearby residents.

Working in conjunction with our diesel generators, these units drastically reduce fuel usage, which in turn helps you achieve your carbon reduction goals. With two different sized units available for hire, we will provide a package to suit your application. Fitted with remote fleet monitoring technology, we can monitor the performance of our equipment during it’s time on site to ensure optimum performance.
 
Not sure which of our battery units is best suited for your job?

Get in touch with our expert team to discuss your application in more detail.
